meanings.definition: Willing to take risks or try new things.
meanings.sent1: She is an adventurous eater, always trying new foods.
meanings.sent2: The adventurous explorer climbed the tall mountain.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous cat decided to explore the neighbor's yard.
meanings.sent4: His adventurous spirit led him to travel the world.
meanings.sent5: The adventurous child eagerly jumped into the pool without hesitation.

meanings.definition: Full of excitement or new experiences.
meanings.sent1: The adventurous movie kept us on the edge of our seats.
meanings.sent2: The adventurous carnival was filled with thrilling rides.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous book took us on a magical journey.
meanings.sent4: Her adventurous personality made every day fun.
meanings.sent5: The adventurous roller coaster provided an exhilarating ride.

meanings.sent1: The adventurous trip to the jungle was unforgettable.
meanings.sent2: The adventurous treasure hunt led to hidden surprises.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous idea of building a treehouse excited the kids.
meanings.sent4: His adventurous proposal involved a hot air balloon ride.
meanings.sent5: The adventurous concert featured unexpected guest performers.
